name: cuirboulli breastplate
description: Boiled hide makes surprisingly effective armor.

name: brigandine coat
description: This armor is made up of a coat reinforced by strips of iron.

name: ancient armor
description: Excavated from mysterious ruins, this breastplate has an exotic design.

name: mail hauberk
description: This shirt of steel rings is heavy, but highly protective.

name: scale armor
description: Overlapping scales prevent all but the strongest of blows from piercing this armor.

name: plate armor
description: Surprisingly light, this suit of armor encases the entire body in gleaming steel.

name: wraith shroud
description: Donning this cursed burial wrap causes some attacks to pass through the wearer harmlessly.

name: enchanted mail
description: Complex runes etched into this armor prevent weapons from even touching it.
